segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, but she doesn’t seem to notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and it’s making me a little sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting, and it’s like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter, and it’s only going to cause more problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to do anything about this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, and it’s like she’s in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this whole scene is just a little too chaotic for me.
segments.speaker: PAR
